chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
orig_base_params: BaseParams
one_node_params: OneNodeParams orig_base_params
raft_params: RaftParams orig_base_params
rri: raft_refinement_interface
aelsi: allEntries_leader_sublog_interface
lsi: leader_sublog_interface
rlmli: refined_log_matching_lemmas_interface

Goal:
forall (net : network) (h : Net.name) (e : entry), refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> In e (log (snd (nwState net h))) -> eIndex e = S (maxIndex (log (snd (nwState net h)))) -> False

Premises:
snd = fun (A B : Type) (p : A * B) => let (_, y) := p in y : forall A B : Type, A * B -> B Arguments snd {A B}%type_scope
Record leader_sublog_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_leader_sublog_interface { leader_sublog_invariant_invariant : forall net : network, raft_intermediate_reachable net -> leader_sublog_invariant net } Arguments leader_sublog_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_leader_sublog_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
Record OneNodeParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_OneNodeParams { init : data; handler : input -> data -> output * data } Arguments Build_OneNodeParams _ _ _%function_scope
Record allEntries_leader_sublog_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_allEntries_leader_sublog_interface { allEntries_leader_sublog_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> allEntries_leader_sublog net } Arguments allEntries_leader_sublog_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_allEntries_leader_sublog_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
Record BaseParams : Type := Build_BaseParams { data : Type; input : Type; output : Type } Arguments Build_BaseParams (_ _ _)%type_scope
Inductive False : Prop := 
Record RaftParams (orig_base_params : BaseParams) : Type := Build_RaftParams { N : nat; input_eq_dec : forall x y : input, {x = y} + {x <> y}; output_eq_dec : forall x y : output, {x = y} + {x <> y}; clientId : Type; clientId_eq_dec : forall x y : clientId, {x = y} + {x <> y} } Arguments Build_RaftParams _ _%nat_scope (_ _)%function_scope [clientId]%type_scope _%function_scope
nwState = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) (n : network) => let (_, nwState) := n in nwState : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), network -> Net.name -> data Arguments nwState {P params}
Record entry (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Type := mkEntry { eAt : name; eClient : clientId; eId : nat; eIndex : logIndex; eTerm : term; eInput : input } Arguments entry {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments mkEntry {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _ _%nat_scope
eIndex = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (e : entry) => let (_, _, _, eIndex, _, _) := e in eIndex : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), entry -> logIndex Arguments eIndex {orig_base_params raft_params}
Record network (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) : Type := mkNetwork { nwPackets : list packet; nwState : Net.name -> data } Arguments network {P params} Arguments mkNetwork {P params} _%list_scope _%function_scope
name = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fin N : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, RaftParams orig_base_params -> Type Arguments name {orig_base_params raft_params}
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
Inductive refined_raft_intermediate_reachable (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : network -> Prop := RRIR_init : refined_raft_intermediate_reachable step_async_init | RRIR_step_failure : forall (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (failed' : list Net.name) (net' : network) (out : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed', net') out -> refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net' | RRIR_handleInput : forall (net : network) (h : name) (inp : raft_input) (gd : electionsData
In : forall A : Type, A -> list A -> Prop
maxIndex = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fix maxIndex (entries : list entry) : logIndex := match entries with | [] => 0 | e :: _ => eIndex e end : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), list entry -> logIndex Arguments maxIndex {orig_base_params raft_params} _%list_scope
Notation log := (RaftState.log term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output)
Record refined_log_matching_lemmas_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_refined_log_matching_lemmas_interface { entries_contiguous_nw_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> entries_contiguous_nw net; entries_gt_0_nw_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> entries_gt_0_nw net; entries_sorted_nw_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> entries_sorted_nw net; entries_gt_0_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> entries_gt_0 net;
Record raft_refinement_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_raft_refinement_interface { refined_raft_net_invariant : forall (P : network -> Prop) (net : network), refined_raft_net_invariant_init P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_client_request P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_timeout P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries_reply P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote_reply P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_do_leader P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_do_generic_server P -> refined_raft_net_invariant_state_same_packet
leader_sublog = fun net : network => forall (leader : Net.name) (e : entry) (h : Net.name), type (snd (nwState net leader)) = Leader -> In e (log (snd (nwState net h))) -> eTerm e = currentTerm (snd (nwState net leader)) -> In e (log (snd (nwState net leader))) : network -> Prop

entries_gt_0 = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (h : Net.name) (e : entry), In e (log (snd (nwState net h))) -> eIndex e > 0 : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments entries_gt_0 {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
entries_match_nw_host = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (p : packet) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (h : Net.name) (e e' e'' : entry), In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t n pli plt es ci -> In e es -> In e' (log (snd (nwState net h))) -> eIndex e = eIndex e' -> eTerm e = eTerm e' -> In e'' es -> eIndex e'' <= eIndex e ->...-> Prop Arguments entries_match_nw_host {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
Build_refined_log_matching_lemmas_interface : (forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> entries_contiguous_nw net) -> (forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> entries_gt_0_nw net) -> (forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> entries_sorted_nw net) -> (forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> entries_gt_0 net) -> (forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> entries_contiguous net) -> (forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> entries_sorted net) -> (forall (net : network) (h h' : Net.name), refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> entries_match (log (snd (nwState net h))) (log (snd (nwState net h')))) ->...-> refined_log_matching_lemmas_interface
